pr_title: GPS Maps: Adds Layer change Button

timeline.message: Adds a white background to the layer icon
Adds the default map layer setting

timeline.bodyText: Flagging that imports need to get cleaned up here
timeline.author: ctsims

timeline.bodyText: Might be worth putting a link to where these come from and where to update them
timeline.author: ctsims

+/**
